attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the government to provide the public with free vehicle registration checks, via the DVLA or a new body, in order that anyone purchasing a vehicle privately, can check that the vehicle has not been stolen, written off, or has unpaid finance etc.

rejection.details: This was submitted twice.  Your other petition has been approved.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
